articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
img {border-radius: 5%}

Research Interests
Uncertainty Quantification
Statistics
Probability
Current Position
Since November 2019, I am a PhD student in Statistics at CEA (French Atomic Energy Commission) and Applied Mathematics Laboratory, École Polytechnique, under the supervision of Josselin Garnier, PhD director, and Cyril Feau (CEA, EMSI). My work concerns the propagation of epistemic uncertainties of a mechanical structure into its seismic fragility curves using machine learning techniques and the development of active learning strategies for fragility curve estimation.
Contact
You can write me an e-mail at: clement “dot” gauchy “at” polytechnique “dot” edu
